Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.EXPLANATION: Percentage of individuals who complete and submit a survey compared to the total number of surveys distributed.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.FORMULA: (Number of Survey Responses / Total Number of Survey Invitations) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with a specific interaction or service, usually obtained through post-interaction surveys.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Scores / Total Number of Responses)

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.EXPLANATION: Metric assessing customer loyalty and likelihood to recommend the company to others, measured through a single question survey.
Measurement of the ease of customer interactions with the company, indicating how much effort customers have to put in to get their issues resolved.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.FORMULA: Average Effort Score Given by Customers for Service or Interaction

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.KPIS: Action taken based on survey feedback.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.EXPLANATION: Degree to which feedback from surveys leads to actionable improvements or changes in products, services, or processes.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.FORMULA: (Number of Actions Taken / Total Survey Feedback Items) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.EXPLANATION: Average amount of time it takes for respondents to complete a survey, used to gauge survey design and user experience.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Complete the Survey

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.KPIS: Survey feedback integration with improvement initiatives.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.EXPLANATION: Extent to which survey feedback is used to inform and drive improvements in products, services, or processes.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.FORMULA: (Number of Feedback Points Integrated / Total Feedback Points) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to obtain each survey response, including survey design, distribution, and analysis expenses.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Retention+C.FORMULA: Total Cost of Survey / Total Number of Responses
